attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the Uk government will allowed migrant reporting at the immigration centres some right to work or do a voluntary job for the them to get monies for bus pass and something to buy food to eat

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
